main.name: Arjun Pandiyan
main.description: I, like anyone else first am an Observer. Building things in the cyber world is what I liked and that is what I do for a living. I have been part of the software industry from 2008 working for different companies. I continue to have a blast learning and doing what excites me
main.bio: I started my career as an intern at Horizon Wind Energy at Houston, TX. This was the most exciting times where I built a MS Silverlight application that showcased a map powered by ARC GIS for showing wind farms. From there I worked as a Software Engineer in several other companies like E-GuideTV, Zynga, Intuit, Coursera and ServiceNow. I have not worked on the same technology in any of these companies. Blessing or curse that I switched so much but now I see the big picture and I love it
